original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ niyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁ niyyānik aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na an idassanaappaṭigh o ▁na niyyānik o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁cha ▁ adhipatiyā ▁cha ▁pe ▁avigate ▁cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ aniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁a niyyānik aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paccayā ▁nasanidassanas a ppaṭi gh o ▁na a niyyānik o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi
